pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, April 25, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, April 25, 2017:


Kitchener, Ontario 

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Vidyard and will participate in a Q&A with employees.

8 Queen Street North
Kitchener, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit and open coverage for Q&A
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Business Council of Canada.

Closed to media


Guelph, Ontario 

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Frank Hasenfratz Centre of Excellence in Manufacturing

700 Woodlawn Road West
Guelph, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.


Media Appearances

  • An interview with the Prime Minister will air at 10:30 a.m on 570 News with Glenn Pelletier.
  • An interview with the Prime Minister will air during the 12:00 p.m. and 6:00 p.m. newscasts of CTV Kitchener.
